name: Dreams of the Vassal
description:
Explore and fight the creatures and dreams from the mind of a mad vassal. You are a warrior created for this purpose. In this prototype you will be able to fight two of the enemies that you will meet in this game, in a taste of the environment that you will be fighting in.

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to look around

LMB to attack

How to play:

Download the zip file attached. Unzip the file. Open the "Dreams of the Vassal" application inside the file.
